item.title: Amazon deal of the day: Breville's Super Q Blender just dropped below $400 — a record-low price
item.description: Amazon's best deals of the day on July 5 include the Breville Super Q Blender, M3 MacBook Pro, AirTags, Shark FlexStyle, and more.

item.title: Upgrade your kitchen when you shop today's best KitchenAid deals at Amazon
item.description: Today, July 5, save over 25% on KitchenAid equipment at Amazon. Shop savings on the KitchenAid stand mixer, immersion blender, and attachments.

item.title: Don't feel like cooking? Collect the best DoorDash promo codes of the week.

item.title: Get the Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II for their lowest price ever at Amazon
item.description: As of July 5, get the Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II for just $169.95, their lowest price yet at Amazon.
